mapper.insert: insert into product_middle_category(pmc_num, pmc_name, pmc_plc_num) select ifnull(max(pmc_num),0)+1, #{pc.pmc_name}, ifnull(max(pmc_plc_num),0)+1 from product_middle_category
insert into product_small_category(psc_num, psc_name, psc_pmc_num) select ifnull(max(psc_num),0)+1, #{pc.psc_name}, ifnull(max(psc_pmc_num),0)+1 from product_small_category
insert into product_category(pc_num, pc_name, pc_psc_num) select ifnull(max(pc_num),0)+1, #{pc.pc_name}, ifnull(max(pc_psc_num),0)+1 from product_category
